bio: After more than 9 years working in the tech industry, Jorge is a full stack developer with focus on JavaScript technologies. Today, Jorge is working at ByteDefault using Angular / RxJS / Firebase / Nativescript as well as other technologies. He delivered several courses and talks as well as write some tech articles on these subjects. Because of that, he was recognised as a Google Developer Expert in Angular & web technologies and Nativescript Developer Expert.
name: Jorge Cano
shortBio: After more than 9 years working in the tech industry, Jorge is a full stack developer with focus on JavaScript technologies...
title: Google Developer Expert

bio: Josue has been a software developer during the last 10 years working for companies in Mexico and USA, now he is specialized in web development, data visualization and e-commerce systems/strategies, also he is part of the Google Developer Expert program.
name: Josue Gutierrez
shortBio: Josue has been a software developer during the last 10 years working for companies in Mexico and USA...
title: Google Developer Expert

bio: Andrés is a passionate Web Developer, who started to feel interested in technology approximately in 2012, and especially Google technology, when in that same year he knows Google App Scripts. Venezuelan based in Argentina, "El Pana", as they know him in the environment of the Javascript communities of Buenos Aires, is considered an eternal beginner, a condition that drives him to always be in constant learning.
name: Andrés Villanueva
shortBio: Venezuelan based in Argentina, Andrés is a passionate Web Developer, who started to feel interested in technology approximately in 2012...
title: Google Developer Expert

bio: Juan is a Colombian-based software engineer and the organizer of the first Angular conference in Latin America: NgColombia. Juan strongly believes in community efforts as enablers for social change, that's why he runs Angular Medellin, one of the most successful meetups in the region with a participation rate of +100 people per month where he is constantly encouraging members to improve their professional skills. At Yuxi Global, Juan is the Head of Front-end Development with the responsibility of training in-house teams and providing consultancy on how to build professional Angular solutions for american clients. In his spare time, Juan loves to talk about psychology, philosophy, and spirituality. Also, he is an avid dancer and musician.
name: Juan Herrera
shortBio: Juan is a Colombian-based software engineer and the organizer of the first Angular conference in Latin America...
title: Google Developer Expert

bio: Israel has been programming for the past 24 years and he was working with Angular since the alphas and AngularJS for over 6 years. He made the first AngularJS Youtube channel in Spanish, and he is a former Mexico City’s Angular Meetups' organizer.
name: Israel Guzmán
shortBio: Israel has been programming for the past 24 years and he was working with Angular since the alphas...

bio: Front End Senior developer working at YUXI Global. Co-organizer and MC for Angular Medellin. Industrial designer passionate about UX-UI 3D design, and 2D animations. He is a lover of scietific knowledge, and a charismatic speaker.

shortBio: Carlos is a Front End Senior developer working at YUXI Global. Co-organizer and MC for Angular Medellin. Industrial designer passionate about UX-UI 3D design...

bio: Diseñador web y profesor con ocho años de experiencia. Mi especialidad es la experiencia de usuario y el diseño de interfaces. Fundé y dirijo EDteam, una plataforma educativa en tecnología con presencia en toda Latinoamerica.

Active member of different technology communities. Currently working at Thoughtworks Ecuador, leading a distributed team between Chile and Ecuador.
name: Byron Torres
shortBio: Byron is a consultant software developer  with more than 11 years of experience in the industry.

bio: Software developer, tech entrepreneur, He’s been involved in the industry since 1997. He founded five tech companies, one of them was the first Bolivian startup that pass a Venture Capital investment round process. Currently: CTO DISSER srl. Bolivia. and Project Lead UBI Project at HandsSon Limited, Malta.
name: Carlos Olivera
shortBio: Software developer, tech entrepreneur, He’s been involved in the industry since 1997.

bio: Frontend Senior en Senseta especializado en el área de FrontEnd & HybripApps, enfocado en el aprendizaje y enseñanza de JS. He dictado cursos sobre desarrollo con Ionic en universidades, empresas y agencias alrededor de latinoamérica y creador de ng-classroom.com sitio enfocado al aprendizaje y buenas prácticas en desarrollo híbrido.

shortBio: I am a software developer who is passionate about Web applications and Hybrid Apps. I love to be developer and to create software. I love to be an speaker in meetups and conferences.
title: FrontEnd Senior

bio: Ingeniero de Sistemas, actualmente se desempeña como Especialista de Software(Apps Móviles) y UX Design en la empresa de telecomunicaciones VIVA, tiene un postgrado en Desarrollo de Apps Móviles y varios cursos e investigaciones en el campo de UI/UX, en su tiempo libre participa activamente en comunidades de tecnología y emprendimiento como ser: GDG Cochabamba, Angular Bolivia, Docker Cochabamba y Startup Weekend Cochabamba. Ha participado en diferentes universidades y eventos del país, como también en el exterior dando charlas y talleres acerca de UX y desarrollo de aplicaciones móviles.

shortBio: Ingeniero de Sistemas, actualmente se desempeña como Especialista de Software(Apps Móviles) y UX Design en la empresa de telecomunicaciones VIVA...

bio: Ella es una software engineer que se graduó de la carrera de Informática de la UMSA en Bolivia el 2017, ha sido miembro y liderado muchas comunidades de tecnología en la ciudad de La Paz entre ellas Google Developers Group La Paz, Women Techmakers La Paz, Núcleo GNU/Linux. Actualmente está realizando prácticas como web developer en New York trabajando en un proyecto social.  Es apasionada respecto a aprender sobre nuevas tecnologías, compartir lo que aprende dando charlas a las comunidades de tecnología en el mundo!
name: Lupe Canaviri Maydana
shortBio: Ella es una software engineer que se graduó de la carrera de Informática de la UMSA en Bolivia el 2017
title: Software Engineer

bio: Como Ingeniero Informático  mi formación académica y laboral se ha orientado al desarrollo de software,  con amplia experiencia desde el 2008, con capacidad para trabajar en equipo, capacidad de adaptación y aprendizaje por las nuevas tecnologías. Actualmente desarrollo  aplicaciones Front End (Angular 6) y uso de Asp.net Core para múltiples plataformas.  Usando también Ionic para el desarrollo de aplicaciones móviles hibridas. Pertenezco al GDG Santa cruz como organizador, e realizado el evento de Angular Day 2018 en la Universidad UTEPSA. Tambien dando conferencias en los diferentes eventos del GDG Santa cruz desde el 2016, e invitaciones de diferentes universidades para dar charlas sobre Angular.

shortBio: Systems engineer with experience in software analysis and development for 10 years. Scrum Developer Certified.
title: Software Developer

bio: Luis works as a Senior Angular Developer and Instructor at AssureSoft Corp where he is currently a lead development engineer of a front-end team with special focus on Angular as main technology and framework. He started to develop web apps with AngularJS 1.2 and he mainly has worked with JavaScript since then. He’s an enthusiast of Open Source software, web technologies and communities. He’s the organizer of the Angular Bolivia community. When he is not coding, Luis is reading about Astronomy or nerding about outer space, photography or even doing Astrophotography.
